S4.T1.caption: Table 1: Comparison of accuracy, loss, and rounds required to reach 80%percent8080\% accuracy.
references: The performance comparison of FedGSP. We compare FedGSP with seven state-of-the-art approaches and summarize their test accuracy, test loss and training rounds (required to reach the accuracy of 80%percent8080\%) in Table 1. The results show that FedGSP achieves 5.3%percent5.35.3\% higher accuracy than FedAvg and reaches the accuracy of 80%percent8080\% within only 343434 rounds. Moreover, FedGSP outperforms all the comparison approaches, with an average of 3.7%percent3.73.7\% higher accuracy, 0.1230.1230.123 lower loss and 84%percent8484\% less rounds, which shows its effectiveness to improve FL performance in the presence of non-i.i.d. data.
